tool_description: Analyzes transaction patterns to identify potential fraud indicators, risk scores, and suspicious activity patterns.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

risk_threshold.description: Risk score threshold for flagging suspicious transactions (0-100)

velocity_check_enabled.description: Whether to check for high-velocity transaction patterns

amount_anomaly_detection.description: Whether to detect unusual transaction amounts

geographic_analysis.description: Whether to analyze geographic transaction patterns

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
Invalid risk threshold: Must be a number between 0 and 100.
Insufficient transaction data: At least 100 transactions required for meaningful fraud analysis.
Missing required data fields: Transaction data must include timestamps and amounts for fraud analysis.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id and configure fraud detection parameters including risk threshold and analysis types to identify suspicious transaction patterns.

high_risk_transactions.description: Number of transactions flagged as high risk

average_risk_score.description: Average risk score across all transactions

fraud_indicators.description: List of identified fraud indicators and their frequencies

amount_anomalies.description: Number of transactions with unusual amounts
